text: The total hundial collection of Sri Dhandayuthapaniswamy temple for the past 19 days was Rs.1,36,47,000 in cash, according to Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments department Joint Commissioner P. Rajamanickam here on Wednesday. Besides, 1,006 grams of gold, 5,300 grams of silver and 686 number of foreign currency notes in various denominations were the other collections in the hundial, he added.
title: Hundial collection
